summary: Iteration 6: Tested all 4 bugfixes for CANUSA Nexus - (1) Top 10 Artikel kompakter, (2) PDF-Einbettung als iFrame, (3) User-Löschung für Admins, (4) Theme-Mode als Dropdown. All features verified working correctly.

test_credentials.note: Used temporary test admin user for testing, cleaned up after tests

context_for_next_testing_agent: All 4 bugfixes verified: (1) Top 10 Artikel section is now compact with smaller items in horizontal scrollable row, page has max-w-full and overflow-hidden, (2) PDF import dialog shows iFrame preview with 'Neuer Tab' button and 'PDF einbetten' button to embed PDF as iFrame in article, (3) DELETE /api/users/{id} endpoint works for user deletion - admin can block AND delete users - UI shows 3 buttons per user row (Rolle, Sperren, Löschen), (4) Theme toggle is now a Dropdown with Hell/Dunkel/Automatisch options instead of single button.

top_10_kompakt.notes: Top 10 Artikel section shows compact items with smaller badges (1-7 visible), horizontal scroll, no page overflow

neuer_artikel_button.notes: 'Neuer Artikel' button visible in top right of Articles page with data-testid='create-article-btn'

theme_dropdown.notes: Theme toggle is now dropdown with Hell/Dunkel/Automatisch options, accessed via data-testid='theme-toggle'

delete_user_api.notes: DELETE /api/users/{id} works correctly - returns {message: 'User deleted'}, user no longer found after deletion

delete_user_ui.notes: User Management shows 3 action buttons per row (Rolle, Sperren, Löschen trash icon) with data-testid='delete-user-{id}'

pdf_iframe_preview.notes: PDF import dialog shows iFrame preview of uploaded PDF with h-64 height

pdf_neuer_tab_button.notes: 'Neuer Tab' button with ExternalLink icon opens PDF in new browser tab via window.open

pdf_einbetten_button.notes: 'PDF einbetten' button inserts iFrame HTML into article content for embedded PDF viewing
